title: Oscar Watch
description: Oscar Watch is an application that allows user to search up movies that have been either nominated for an Oscar or received one. Oscar watch allows users to create an account and create a list of movies they would want to watch.

title: React Portfolio
description: React Portfolio is built with React demonstrating a combination of React front end with back end Node.js
